data.name: Veteran Services
data.description:
Established in 1946, the San Mateo County Veterans Services Office (CVSO) helps veterans access state and federal benefits that help veterans, their spouses and family members, as follows: 
Service-connected disability compensation claims
Non-service connected pension claims
California State veterans benefits
Veterans Affairs (VA) life insurance
VA burial benefits
VA home loans
College fee tuition waivers for dependents
